title: Zoom Video, Carnival, Peloton, Moderna: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Vaccine makers are jumping on fresh Covid-19 fears while travel stocks are sliding
body:
Global markets are taking a hit on Black Friday amid worries about a new Covid-19 variant—but some familiar names are getting a boost. Here’s what we’re watching:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
